# Agent Configuration

## Ignored Directories

- `dist/` - Build output, automatically generated by `bun run build`. Do not modify directly.
- `node_modules/` - Dependencies

## Build & Test

- Build: `bun run build`
- Test: `bun run test`
- Lint: `bun run lint`

## API Endpoints Reference

Base URL: `https://api.weather.bom.gov.au/v1/`

Available BOM API endpoints (from reverse-engineering docs):
- `GET /locations?search=<location>` - Location search (min 3 chars)
- `GET /locations/<geohash>` - Location information
- `GET /locations/<geohash>/observations` - Current observations
- `GET /locations/<geohash>/warnings` - Weather warnings for location
- `GET /locations/<geohash>/forecasts/daily` - Daily forecasts
- `GET /locations/<geohash>/forecasts/hourly` - Hourly forecasts
- `GET /warnings/<id>` - Warning details by ID
